parameters.name: CDP Workload User Password
parameters.description: Specify the password of the CDP machine user or workload user you're using to authenticate against Kafka and Hive.

parameters.name: Schema Registry Hostname
parameters.description: Specify the hostname of the Schema Registry you want to connect to. This must be the direct hostname of the Schema Registry itself, not the Knox Endpoint.

parameters.name: CDP Workload User
parameters.description: Specify the CDP machine user or workload user name that you want to use to authenticate to Kafka and Hive. Ensure this user has the appropriate access rights in Ranger for the Kafka topic and ID Broker for Hive access.

parameters.name: Iceberg Table Name
parameters.description: Specify the Iceberg table you want to write to running in your Hive Virtual Warehouse.

parameters.name: CSV Delimiter
parameters.description: If your source data is CSV, specify the delimiter here.

parameters.name: Data Input Format
parameters.description: Specify the format of your input data. You can use "CSV", "JSON" or "AVRO" with this ReadyFlow.

parameters.name: Kafka Consumer Group Id
parameters.description: The name of the consumer group used for the source topic you are consuming from.

parameters.name: Hive Catalog Namespace
parameters.description: Specify the Hive Catalog Namespace. The default value is default, which references the database catalog created automatically when you activate an environment in Cloudera Data Warehouse.

parameters.name: Kafka Broker Endpoint
parameters.description: Specify the Kafka bootstrap servers string as a comma separated list.

parameters.name: Schema Name
parameters.description: Specify the schema name to be looked up in the Schema Registry for the Source Kafka Topic

parameters.name: Kafka Source Topic
parameters.description: Specify a topic name that you want to read from.
